title: First Look: The 2024 Factor SLiCK Gets Conveniently Quicker with In-Frame Storage
content:
The 2024 Factor SLiCK joins a growing number of Triathlon bikes to boast in-frame storage, with a relocation of hydration and food storage to the top tube, and a rework of tube shapes to provide a faster, more convenient race bike for Iron Man distances

Read the full article at First Look: The 2024 Factor SLiCK Gets Conveniently Quicker with In-Frame Storage on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
